title: following Order with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (2)(b) of that
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Covid
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Covid 

Restrictions Support Scheme) (Date Adjustment) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited tax consolidation act 1997 (covid restriction support scheme) (date adjustment) order 2021

title: following Order with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (2)(b) of that
heading: In this Order, “Act of 1997” means the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 1997” means the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 

(No. 39 of 1997).
text_norm: 2 order act 1997 mean tax consolidation act 1997 (no 39 1997)

title: following Order with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (2)(b) of that
heading: 3. 30 June 2021 is specified as the day on which the period referred to in
text_raw:
3. 30 June 2021 is specified as the day on which the period referred to in 
the definition of “specified period” in section 485(1) of the Act of 1997 shall 
expire. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 May, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [220] 3
text_norm: 3 30 june 2021 specified day period referred definition specified period section 485(1) act 1997 shall expire given official seal 7 may 2021 paschal donohoe minister finance notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th may 2021 220 3

title: following Order with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (2)(b) of that
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal interpretation).
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal interpretation). 

This Order provides for an extension of the Covid Restrictions Support Scheme 
to 30 June 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [220]
